source: Chicago Data Portal > Chicago Park District Park Boundaries
methodology: Data was obtained from Chicago Data Portal > Chicago Park District Park Boundaries, and adapted using QGIS. Centroid of all the parks were created, within a half mile radus. Using Join Attributes by Location, by "count" the data was all index using the main Hexagonal Grid
